name: expense_tracking
description: Personal expense tracking web application with OCR processing

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migration: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic revision --autogenerate
